post:
Experience superior performance and privacy with our self managed KVM virtual servers. MilesWeb's KVM VPS hosting allows you to run variety of operating system on a virtual machine for significantly less than the cost of a full dedicated server.


Below is the list of our Self-Managed KVM VPS plans:


SM-KVM 512 [SAVE 46%]

  • 1 Core CPU
  • 30 GB SAS Storage
  • 512 MB RAM
  • 256 MB vSwap
  • 500 GB Bandwidth
  • Monthly $8 USD | Add To Cart



SM-KVM 1024 [SAVE 50%]

  • 1 Core CPU
  • 50 GB SAS Storage
  • 1 GB RAM
  • 512 MB vSwap
  • 1000 GB Bandwidth
  • Monthly $10 USD | Add To Cart



SM-KVM 2048 [SAVE 33%]

  • 2 Core CPU
  • 75 GB SAS Storage
  • 2 GB RAM
  • 768 MB vSwap
  • 2000 GB Bandwidth
  • Monthly $20 USD | Add To Cart  



SM-KVM 4096 [SAVE 20%]

  • 2 Core CPU

  • Monthly $40 USD | Add To Cart  



SM-KVM 6144 [SAVE 14%]

  • 4 Core CPU

  • 1256 MB vSwap
  • 4000 GB Bandwidth
  • Monthly $60 USD | Add To Cart  



Control Panel Options:

  • cPanel / WHM : $13.50 USD Monthly
  • Plesk Web App Edition : $8 USD Monthly

  • Plesk Web Host Edition : $20 USD Monthly



For more details on Self-Managed KVM VPS plans visit https://www.milesweb.com/self-managed-kvm-vps.php


We also offer fully managed and Un-managed KVM/OpenVZ VPS plans for more details visit https://www.milesweb.com/vps-hosting.php
